column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bumi says : " It 's true .
#Text=We 've got a lot to see today , including ancient statues , ancient gardens , and the meditation hall used by ancient airbenders .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Yay .
#Text=Old things .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra ?
#Text=" Jinora , Ikki and Meelo says : " Korra !
#Text=Yay , Korra !
#Text=Korra 's back !
#Text=" Pema says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " Oh , I 've missed you !
#Text=" Kya says : " And how did you know where to find us ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Tenzin 's itinerary .
#Text=We went over it like a hundred times before we left Republic City .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " See ?
#Text=This is why schedules are important .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's so great to see you all again .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It 's great to see you too , but why are n't you training at the South Pole ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , you do n't know about the Civil War ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What ?
#Text=No .
#Text=We 've been out of touch with the outside world since we started our vacation .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Tenzin 's idea .
#Text=What happened ?
#Text=" Korra says : " So much .
#Text=I - I do n't know where to start .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Just tell us everything !
#Text=" Korra says : " Everything ?
#Text=Okay .

#Text=I opened a spirit portal at the South Pole , but then Unalaq turned out to be a bad guy and wanted to take control of the South , so I sort of started a Civil War , but when I went to find some help , I was attacked by my cousins , and then by a giant dark spirit , and then I forgot who I was , and then I met the first Avatar , and then I realized I should n't have opened the portal in the first place , and now I need to close it again !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I knew this would happen .
#Text=So Avatar Wan imprisoned this dark spirit Vaatu in the Spirit World ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes , and now I think my uncle is trying to free him .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I knew Unalaq was hungry for power , but never realized how far he would go to get it .
#Text=" Korra says : " This is all my fault .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No , do n't blame yourself .
#Text=This is Unalaq 's doing .
#Text=Now , we must focus on setting things right before he can do any more damage .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " So , you need to close the Southern portal , but if Unalaq 's army controls the South , how are we going to get to it ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought about that .
#Text=My best chance to close the portal is from the inside .
#Text=I have to enter the Spirit World .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " A journey to the Spirit World .
#Text=All my years of spiritual training have prepared me for this moment .
#Text=I will help you .
#Text=Today , we enter the Spirit World .
#Text="
